author: slive
msg: Add a link from the security reporting page to the bug list at Apache week.
I also changed back to the simple security@apache.org address.  I know
that the other address was there to cut down on idiotic questions, but
the simple address is now exposed in other ASF websites, so I don't
see any benefit to obscuring it here.
